page.title: 20OUR SURVEY OF BREDON HILL
page.content: We have just completed a survey of the {South part of Bredon Hill.}We have seen some interesting bits that we had never seen before.We liked doing it but it was hard on our feet and we got a bit tired when we were walking up the hill.The survey took us just over four weeks to complete. We are the {Junior Class of Overbury C.E.First {School.}We are between 6 and 10 years of age.We all helped to write the entries.Our names are:Amanda Crompton 6 years,Ben Fletcher,Angus Gill,Luke Swan,Christopher Pennington & Roseanne Workman 7 years,Tim Fornara,Alaistair Munro,Matthew Wall,Nicola Bonacker 8 years,Melanie Crompton,Claire Deakin, Paul Gillett,Samantha Hall,Justin Haynes,Martin Phillips 9 years,Rebecca Holt,Amanda Morris,Claire Morris,Anna Turbefield,Nick White 10 years and our teacher Mr.V.F.Warwick.
